-- LINKS TO REFER:

/*
1. External Objects - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/develop-tables-external-tables?tabs=native
2. External File Formats - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/statements/create-external-file-format-transact-sql?view=azure-sqldw-latest&preserve-view=true&tabs=delimited
*/


use master;

GO

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_ldw;

GO 

-- We will use `Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8` collation
-- Because string values in PARQUET file are encoded using UTF-8
-- A mismatch between text encoding in Parquet File and Collation may lead problems in conversion

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_ldw COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8;

GO 

USE nyc_taxi_ldw;

GO 


CREATE SCHEMA bronze;
GO
CREATE SCHEMA silver;
GO
CREATE SCHEMA gold;


GO 


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_src
WITH (
    -- go to container in linked secrion - properties - copy url and paste here
    LOCATION = 'https://synapsedatalakeadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data'
    -- We will not specify the Credential because right now we have an access to the Storage via AAD.
);

GO 


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        -- If USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = TRUE then every NULL value in column will replaced with Default. 
        -- For string it will replace with "", for numeric 0, for date 1900-01-01
        USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
        ENCODING = 'UTF8',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )
)
